recipes.label: 在哥本哈根街头交换轶事
recipes.startdescription: Stories cling to the city like washlines over a street, or like fog on a window. If I engage with the locals, I can pluck Copenhagen's story and tell it as my own.
recipes.description: History is the scar on the skin of the world, and tragedies leave particularly deep scars. It is baked into the bricks of buildings, sticks to our language and gets planted as seeds in childrens hearts...
